mapper.select: SELECT hotel_name hotelName FROM hotel WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId}
SELECT room_name roomName FROM room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
SELECT room_price roomPrice FROM room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_order( customer_id, room_name, hotel_name, room_order_people, room_order_startdate, room_order_enddate, note, create_Date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{customerId}, #{roomName}, #{hotelName}, #{roomOrderPeople}, #{roomOrderStartDate}, #{roomOrderEndDate}, #{note}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT room_order_id roomOrderId, customer_id customerId, hotel_name hotelName, room_name roomName, room_order_people roomOrderPeople, room_order_startdate roomOrderStartDate, room_order_enddate roomOrderEndDate, create_Date createDate, update_Date updateDate FROM room_order where customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{ROW_PER_PAGE}
SELECT room_order_id FROM room_order WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_payment( room_order_id, room_payment_method, room_payment_method_number, room_payment_money, create_date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{roomOrderId}, #{roomPaymentMethod}, #{roomPaymentMethodNumber}, #{roomPaymentMoney}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT room_order_id roomOrderId, customer_id customerId, room_name roomName, hotel_name hotelName, room_order_people roomOrderPeople, room_order_startdate roomOrderStartDate, room_order_enddate roomOrderEndDate, create_Date createDate, update_Date updateDate FROM room_order ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT ro.room_order_id, ro.customer_id, ro.room_name, ro.hotel_name, ro.room_order_people, ro.room_order_startdate, ro.room_order_enddate, rp.room_payment_method, rp.room_payment_money, rp.create_Date FROM room_payment rp INNER JOIN room_order ro ON rp.room_order_id = ro.room_order_id

SELECT ro.room_order_id, ro.customer_id, ro.room_name, ro.hotel_name, ro.room_order_people, ro.room_order_startdate, ro.room_order_enddate, ro.note, ro.create_date, rp.room_payment_id, rp.room_payment_method, rp.room_payment_money, rp.create_date FROM room_payment rp INNER JOIN room_order ro ON rp.room_order_id = ro.room_order_id WHERE rp.room_order_id = #{roomOrderId}
